note.content: The austin.rr.com email settings provided on this site are intended for use on the iPhone using the AT&T wireless data network. These settings may not be compatible if the iPhone is connected to a Wi-Fi network or other cellular network.

A Windows Live Hotmail Plus subscription is required to use Hotmail accounts with Mail. Visit get.live.com/mailplus/features for details. You can also access your Hotmail account on the web at mail.live.com.
A MSN Premium subscription is required to use MSN accounts with Mail. Vist join.msn.com/premium/features for details. You can also access your MSN account on the web at mail.live.com.
Orange iPhone customers should enter their phone number followed by @orange.fr as the username for the Primary outgoing mail server. Example: 06xxxxxxxx@orange.fr

The outgoing mail server setting provided is intended for O2 customers in the UK. O2 customers should enter their O2 email address in the Primary Outgoing Mail Server username field and their password.

When using a grandecom.net e-mail account outside of Grande Communication's network you will need to check incoming e-mail first before you can send e-mail. Checking incoming e-mail happens automatically when you first open Mail.

The pepb.net email settings provided on this site are intended for use on the iPhone using the AT&T wireless data network. These settings may not be compatible if the iPhone is connected to a Wi-Fi network or other cellular network.

The outgoing mail server setting provided is intended for O2 customers in the UK. O2 customers should enter their O2 email address in the Primary Outgoing Mail Server username field and their password.

The outgoing mail server setting provided is intended for O2 customers in the UK. O2 customers should enter their O2 email address in the Primary Outgoing Mail Server username field and their password.

The outgoing mail server setting provided is intended for O2 customers in the UK. O2 customers should enter their O2 email address in the Primary Outgoing Mail Server username field and their password.

A Windows Live Hotmail Plus subscription is required to use live.com accounts with Mail. Visit get.live.com/mailplus/features for details. You can also access your Hotmail account on the web at mail.live.com.
If you don't know the correct mail server information for your area, contact Suddenlink customer support at 1-800-490-9604.
Username = phone number
username = phone number
